name: Neps: Virtual Pet Gold
description:
*NOTICE: We have problems to run the app in Samsung s5 model, please, don't buy this version if you have this device. We will fix this bug soon. Sorry, the development team.

Neps are virtual pets with incredible powers and abilities.

Take care of your Nep in this retro-simulator inspired by the 8bits toys of the '90s.

*TRY FIRST THE FREE VERSION OF NEP:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=appinventor.ai_jotakupo2.AAANeps&hl=es

Our Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NepVirtualPet/?ref=aymt_homepage_panel

-Explore the Desert, the City, the Beach and the Volcano in search of the 99 new different Neps to register them all in your ''NepDex''.

-Train with your Nep and make it evolve to its maximum stage; Become the best Nep Tamer ever!

-Fight with your friends in Bluetooth Multiplayer Mode.

-Level up! Defeat the Guardians Neps! And find the mythical Gargonep in ''Nep: Virtual Pet Gold''

-Personalize your nep's home with the 8 different unlockables backgrounds.


HOW TO PLAY:

· To dodge enemy attacks, press the ''Shield'' button as many times as you can before it hit your Nep.
· To recover health points, put the Nep to sleep.
· To reset the app, press and hold the X button several times.


Inspired by: Tamagotchi and Digimon games.
